gurmukhi: hir s~cy qKq rcwieAw siq sMgiq mylw [
transliteration: har saachae thakhath rachaaeiaa sath sangath maelaa |a
translation: The Lord God established the True congregation of the holy as his celestial throne.

gurmukhi: nwnk inrBau inrMkwr ivic isDW Kylw [
transliteration: naanak nirabho nirankaar vich sidhaa(n) khaelaa |a
translation: Guru Nanak illuminated the Yogi Sidhs with the true form of the Fearless and Formless One.

gurmukhi: guru ismr mnweI kwlkw KMfy kI vylw [?
transliteration: gur simar manaaee kaalakaa khanddae kee vaelaa |aa
translation: In His Tenth Form, the Guru entreated the Shakti, the Integrity by bequeathing the nectar through the double edged sword.

gurmukhi: pIvhu pwhul KMfyDwr hoie jnm suhylw [?
transliteration: peevahu paahul khanddaedhaar hoe janam suhaelaa |aa
translation: Drink the Amrit nectar of double edged Khanda sword, accomplish the worth of your birth.

transliteration: gur sangath keenee khaalasaa manamukhee dhuhaelaa |aa
translation: While the egocentric remains in duality, the Khalsa - the pure ones, enjoy the association of the Guru;

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy gur cylw ]1]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 1 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and Disciple too.

gurmukhi: scw Amr goibMd dw sux gurU ipAwry [?
transliteration: sachaa amar gobindh dhaa sun guroo piaarae |aa
translation: O the beloved of the Guru, listen to the Eternal and True (Message of Guru) Gobind Singh.

gurmukhi: siq sMgiq mylwp kir pMc dUq sMGwry [?
transliteration: sath sangath maelaap kar panch dhooth sanghaarae |aa
translation: When one joins the True Assembly, the five vices are liquidated.

gurmukhi: ivic sMgiq FoeI nw lihin jo Ksmu ivswry [?
transliteration: vich sangath toee naa lehin jo khasam visaarae |aa
translation: In the Congregation no respect is accorded to the ones who disregard their Spouses,
But the Guru's Sikh remains unblemished in the Court of Righteousness.

gurmukhi: hir guru goibMd iDAweIAY sic AMimRq vylw [
transliteration: har gur gobindh dhiaaeeai sach anmrith vaelaa |a
translation: And sequentially, always, meditate on Godly Guru Gobind Singh in the ambrosial hour.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cylw ]2]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 2 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.
